Property.name: aSave
Property.HelpText: Enables the AutoSave feature! Times are roughly the length of the interval between each AutoSave, set to what suits your playstyle best!

Property.name: multisaving
Property.HelpText: Using L-Ctrl, L-Shift, and the num keys on keyboard, or Z (RB, R1, R) and Dpad up and down on Gamepad, you can switch between 20 Chao saves! Allowing for 480 simultaneous Chao!

Property.name: bSave
Property.HelpText: Automatically backs up your Chao when you enter Chao World. (By default they're in the SAVEDATA folder, but you can manually set your own folder!)

Property.name: mutate
Property.HelpText: Gives newborn Chao a rare, 6% chance to mutate. This only affects them visually, and only takes effect after they hatch.

Property.name: unChar
Property.HelpText: Chao can be evolved into a Character Chao using the required eggshell hats, animals, and filing out the other requirements! (Doesn't work with CWE)

Property.name: eCToys
Property.HelpText: Allow Chao to use the unused rattles based on their alignment!

Property.name: eGToys
Property.HelpText: Allow all toys to spawn in all gardens! (Safety option will only spawn the toys if toy spawn locations are set for the current custom garden)

Property.name: bAge
Property.HelpText: Fruit aging is reworked and based on time! Rather than random actions like pausing.

Property.name: enhanced_camera
Property.HelpText: A better camera for Chao World! Analog input, vertical movement, freeze, and panning in advanced mode!

Property.name: cTranType
Property.HelpText: Select which transporter you'd like the gardens to use!

Property.name: mode_num
Property.HelpText: A completely overhauled Chao shadow system which fixes many issues and has many visual advantages over vanilla! (Legacy is the pre-1.4.1 version)

Property.name: kind_chao
Property.HelpText: What type of shadows Chao should use! Multiple applies shadows to different parts of a Chao's body, while single only uses one!

Property.name: toy_shadows
Property.HelpText: Restores the shadows under the garden toys that were lost when the game was ported to GameCube!

Property.name: kind_num
Property.HelpText: The type of shadows used for Enhanced Shadows! Solid is pure models, soft use a soft texture

Property.name: lobby_msger
Property.HelpText: Restores Omochao greeting you in the Chao Lobby!

Property.name: cRipple
Property.HelpText: Restores the water ripples as Chao swim that were lost when the game was ported to GameCube!

Property.name: mSound
Property.HelpText: Allows Chao to make more varied sfx during gameplay by restoring unused sounds!

Property.name: mAnim
Property.HelpText: Allows Chao to perform more varied animations during gameplay by restoring unused animations!

Property.name: dxRun
Property.HelpText: Your Chao will permanently sprint with their hands behind their back in Chao Races! (Requires More Chao Animations!)

Property.name: altMush
Property.HelpText: Restores the unused red, alternate Mushroom texture! Making the Base and Alt. Mushrooms easier to tell apart!

Property.name: chaosJngl
Property.HelpText: Restores the unused Chaos Chao evolve jingles! In vanilla, only dark is used, but there is a hero one! (Doesn't work with CWE)

Property.name: racTail
Property.HelpText: Restores the unused Raccoon tails, which exist within the game but were never implemented.

Property.name: wings
Property.HelpText: Wing color and texture match the Chao that they're attatched to.

Property.name: dcMiles
Property.HelpText: Use the DC animations for Tails in the Chao gardens! Either only moving while holding something, or all his anims! (turn off anims in DC characters mod)

Property.name: dcTran
Property.HelpText: Swaps the garden transition sound for the deeper and slower DC variant. Second option allows the sound to fully play out!

Property.name: dcClass
Property.HelpText: The Classroom will continue to play the normal Kindergarten music, just like Dreamcast!

Property.name: gFont
Property.HelpText: Replaces the font in Chao world with the one from GCN, which also fixes errors with letter spacing.

Property.name: gcTitl
Property.HelpText: Uses the original Stagetitles for SA2B!

Property.name: eggSet
Property.HelpText: Randomizes the egg sets in the BM, allowing all saves to buy all types of Eggs!

Property.name: bFruit
Property.HelpText: Increases the points given by the "Chao Fruit" from 12 to 30 points in each stat.

Property.name: bDrive
Property.HelpText: Increases the points given by "Chaos Drives" from 24 to 40 points in each stat including Luck and Intel.

Property.name: bMush
Property.HelpText: Increases the points given by the Base/Alt Mushrooms from 12/20 to 42/55, and gives 42/55 to Luck and Intel.

Property.name: gCap
Property.HelpText: Increases the max Chao cap in the Gardens. 8 or under is considered off.

Property.name: clamber
Property.HelpText: Chao can climb infinitely, rather than falling after a certain distance, to stop them getting stuck in loops.

Property.name: lHop
Property.HelpText: Makes Chao 100% likely to fly when reaching an edge! Unless they want to swim or can't fly, where they will hop! (They won't fall in water as much!)

Property.name: f2C
Property.HelpText: Allows Chao to transition to climbing while flying! Usefull in taller maps and the Enhanced Gardens!

Property.name: enSpin
Property.HelpText: Enable or disable the ability to spindash and somersault in the Chao Gardens.

Property.name: enAge
Property.HelpText: Enables fruit to age with the above option! With this disabled, your garden will likely become full quickly, as fruit won't ever rot. (Max 40 fruit)

Property.name: qExit
Property.HelpText: Allows you to quickly exit Chao World without saving by pressing L, R, and Y while paused.

Property.name: dxAlign
Property.HelpText: Only Hero and Dark fruit can change a Chao's alignment, making Neutrals easier and stopping random shifts that are out of your control.

Property.name: garden_apos
Property.HelpText: Enable or disable the vanilla feature that changes a childs alignment depending on the garden they're in.

Property.name: garden_grow
Property.HelpText: Enable or disable the vanilla feature that changes an adults natural growth speed by different amounts depending on the garden.

Property.name: cParts
Property.HelpText: Allows Chaos and Character Chao to display their animal parts. They can get them in vanilla, but they're hidden from view, this option re-enables them.

Property.name: cEyes
Property.HelpText: Allows Chaos Chao's eyes to be more emotive, rather than being locked to their default look!

Property.name: dEyes
Property.HelpText: Disables Dark Chao having angry eyes forced on them after evolving. On by default due to a bug that stops them from being removed after reincarnation.

Property.name: cKnux
Property.HelpText: Switches the Knuckles Chao icon, or emote ball, color to a better suiting yellow color, before it was green and matched the Tails Chao.

Property.name: mayuSpd
Property.HelpText: Halves or doubles the time that Chao are in their evolution and reincarnation cocoons for.

Property.name: void
Property.HelpText: With this off, Void Chao, or White (UNUSED), will render as a normal white. Included in CWE Color Comp.!

Property.name: objCull
Property.HelpText: Stops garden objects being culled when too far away, useful for larger gardens and the Enhanced Gardens!

Property.name: tranSkp
Property.HelpText: Speeds up the garden transition so passing through garden gates is more snappy!

Property.name: jTitl
Property.HelpText: Switch the language of the Stagetitles (Eng ⇋ Jap).

Property.name: enShadd
Property.HelpText: Enable or disable the shadows on Chao and other Chao world objects such as fruit and Chaos Drives.

Property.name: use
Property.HelpText: Which varient of the garden SECW will use!

Property.name: vert
Property.HelpText: May need to be disabled for certain texture paks. Leave on unless specified by the texture mod creator.

Property.name: tree
Property.HelpText: Use the SADX trees over the default garden trees.

Property.name: tran
Property.HelpText: Enable or disable the Transporter in this garden.

Property.name: use
Property.HelpText: Which varient of the garden SECW will use!

Property.name: vert
Property.HelpText: May need to be disabled for certain texture paks. Leave on unless specified by the texture mod creator.

Property.name: tree
Property.HelpText: Use the SADX trees over the default garden trees.

Property.name: tran
Property.HelpText: Enable or disable the Transporter in this garden.

Property.name: use
Property.HelpText: Which varient of the garden SECW will use!

Property.name: vert
Property.HelpText: May need to be disabled for certain texture paks. Leave on unless specified by the texture mod creator.

Property.name: tree
Property.HelpText: Use the SADX trees over the default garden trees.

Property.name: tran
Property.HelpText: Enable or disable the Transporter in this garden.

Property.name: use
Property.HelpText: The Enhanced lobby comes with a slew of rendering fixes and other minor enhancements! (All options requre it on!).

Property.name: open
Property.HelpText: Remove the Roof Dome and/or the Floor Dome in the Lobby to open it up! *Requires Enhanced Lobby!

Property.name: stair
Property.HelpText: Remove shadows from the stairs, making them look glowy and more magical! *Requires Enhanced Lobby!

Property.name: glow
Property.HelpText: Remove shadows from the gate glows! *Requires Enhanced Lobby!

Property.name: use
Property.HelpText: Use the Enhanced Kindergarten over Vanilla! (Some options requre it, and are marked with *).

Property.name: tabl
Property.HelpText: Enable or Disable the table in the center of the Kindergarten seen in the Dreamcast version.

Property.name: skip_ent
Property.HelpText: Skip the tedius trip in and out the Kindergarten every time you enter and leave! You will instantly spawn in the Kinder Lobby!

Property.name: enLib
Property.HelpText: Replaces the Fortune Teller room with the unused Library! Made by SPEEPSHighway.

Property.name: eClass
Property.HelpText: If your Chao is in class, they will spawn in the classroom over the generic Chao! Or spawn only your Chao, and leave empty otherwise!

Property.name: rTimer
Property.HelpText: A few settings that change how long the Black Market takes to Restock it's stock. In vanilla it's 3 -> 7 minutes.

Property.name: rFixes
Property.HelpText: Fixes various collision issues and shadow rendering issues in the Races. Unless there's a specific reason, this should be left on.

Property.name: rCam
Property.HelpText: Use left and right on the Dpad, or A and D on keyboard, to switch which Chao is currently in focus during a race.

Property.name: enMap
Property.HelpText: Enable or Disable the Mini-map show during Chao races.

Property.name: pQROCK
Property.HelpText: Restores the intended rock that should fall when a Chao gets a question wrong, over Omochao!

Property.name: raceAdv
Property.HelpText: Allows you the player to run freely during Chao races, however you can't tell your Chao to sprint anymore.

Property.name: enShadd
Property.HelpText: Re-enables shadows in races which were removed from the GCN version up.

Property.name: sfxFix
Property.HelpText: Reduces the volume of Chao World SFX to better match DC! (Auto-disables with SA2 Volume Controls mod)

Property.name: jingle
Property.HelpText: Enables or Disables the Chao level up jingle that causes the music to Restock.

Property.name: AnimJump
Property.HelpText: Enables or Disables the sound an animal makes when it jumps.

Property.name: sfxChao
Property.HelpText: Enables or Disables the sfx in the Chao Garden. (Eg. The waterfall)

Property.name: sfxHero
Property.HelpText: Enables or Disables the sfx in the Hero Garden. (Eg. Bells and the fountain)

Property.name: sfxDark
Property.HelpText: Enables or Disables the sfx in the Dark Garden. (Eg. Howling and flapping)

Property.name: neut_garden
Property.HelpText: Select what music will play in the Chao Garden.

Property.name: hero_garden
Property.HelpText: Select what music will play in the Hero Garden.

Property.name: dark_garden
Property.HelpText: Select what music will play in the Dark Garden.

Property.name: kinder_main
Property.HelpText: Select what music will play in the Kindergarten.

Property.name: chao_hall
Property.HelpText: Select what music will play in the Kindergarten.

Property.name: race_beginner
Property.HelpText: Select what music will play during the Beginner Races.

Property.name: race_jewel
Property.HelpText: Select what music will play during the Jewel Races and 2p Chao Races.

Property.name: race_challenge
Property.HelpText: Select what music will play during the Challenge Races.

Property.name: race_hero
Property.HelpText: Select what music will play during the Hero Races.

Property.name: race_dark
Property.HelpText: Select what music will play during the Dark Races.

Property.name: race_multiplayer
Property.HelpText: Select what music will play during the Multiplayer Races.

Property.name: karate_battle
Property.HelpText: Select what music will play during a Karate match.

Property.name: transporter_main
Property.HelpText: Select what music will play in the Kindergarten.

Property.name: ballFix
Property.HelpText: Fixes the collision on the garden beach balls, which is normally comically too large on the PC port.

Property.name: stuckFix
Property.HelpText: Patches the issue where Chao would get stuck on the garden objects, such as the hero garden pillars.

Property.name: crayFix
Property.HelpText: Flips the Crayon model around, which usually impales a Chao's hand as they use it!

Property.name: grapFix
Property.HelpText: Restores the broken Grapes model! This is a recreation made via context clues, as the original model is lost.

Property.name: ripFix
Property.HelpText: Fixes the water ripples rendering under the water, so it's more like DC! (Affects whole game)

Property.name: frustrum_cull
Property.HelpText: Fixes objects barely off-screen culling too early in Chao World!

Property.name: minimal_sfx
Property.HelpText: Restores the correct SFX sounds to minimals in the garden! In the HD port, they were all randomly jumbled!

Property.name: skFix
Property.HelpText: Restores the 'boing' sound when exiting a room or the Black Market in the Kindergarten, like Dreamcast and GameCube!

Property.name: karaFix
Property.HelpText: Patches up the holes in Chao Karate to better fit 16:9 or more displays!

Property.name: rand
Property.HelpText: Fixes SA2's random number generation, which is completely broken in the HD ports.

Property.name: deco
Property.HelpText: Completely disable the garden decorations, it may give you a performance boost! (Enhanced Gardens only)

Property.name: tstMap
Property.HelpText: Replaces the Neutral Garden with 5 boxes of solid color, for screenshots. (Tails will cause crashes, use Sonic)

Property.name: disable_splash
Property.HelpText: Disables generic startup splashes for ECW.

Property.name: warning_supression
Property.HelpText: Supress ECW popups. These are here for good reason, so only disable them if you know exactly what you're doing.

Property.name: bakDir
Property.HelpText: Custom Backup directory, eg. "D:\Backups\SA2\Chao". Leave blank for default SAVEDATA folder!

Property.name: cwe_colors
Property.HelpText: Enables the CWE Mixed colors to be visible without CWE! (Permission from CWE devs.)

Property.name: chao_cam
Property.HelpText: Enables compatibility with Exant's Chao Camera mod and the Enhanced Chao World Camera feature!

EnumMember.display: Remove the Hero and Dark Dome
